Keywords: Cosmic , Future , Horsemen , Past , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
NOT IMMORTAL... EVERLASTING: The first time Apocalypse would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #8, then roll a d6 and heal him equal to half the result. Protected: Pulse Wave.
AND LO, THERE WERE FOUR HORSEMEN: Leadership. When Apocalypse uses it, after resolutions you may move a friendly character with the Horsemen or X-Men keyword up to half the result of the d6 roll.
THE WORLD'S FIRST MUTANT, PERFECTED THROUGH CELESTIAL TECHNOLOGY: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Steal Energy, Giant Reach: 3.
ALL STORIES END... YET MY STORY GOES ON: Toughness. Regeneration, but roll 2d6 and choose one to be the result.

May 6, 2021
muel0017
4-0. This guy is great no matter what your playstyle, close up or range. I keep him back, use his Leadership to position other X-men a little, outwit, then pen psy. Still have yet to have a game where he is KO'd.
